# Audit Logging â€“ Global

## Purpose
Ensure traceability, accountability, and audit readiness across all domains.

## Logging Rules
- All critical actions must be logged.
- Logs must be immutable and time-ordered.
- Logs must support reconstruction of historical events.

## Audit Requirements
- Logs must identify the triggering action.
- Logs must include sufficient context for review.
- Logs must be retained per regulatory requirements.

## Prohibited
- Deleting or altering audit logs
- Logging sensitive data unnecessarily
- Generating misleading or incomplete audit records
